Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $110. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring you enjoy the full benefits of our product. We're confident it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
